zones.name: Training Forest
zones.description: A peaceful forest filled with weak beasts. Perfect for beginners to test their cultivation.

zones.name: Spirit Cavern
zones.description: A dark cavern infested with spirit beasts. Only cultivators who have advanced their realm should venture here.

zones.name: Mystic Mountains
zones.description: Towering peaks shrouded in mist. Powerful beasts guard ancient treasures here.
